recipesJson.name: Lenola cream remix
recipesJson.author: dazcole
recipesJson.description:
#remixmonth

A little late to the show but I thought I'd share what is a pretty great remix of the infamous Lenola cream by kite in clouds.

Tasty strawberries and dark berries,banana,cream and graham crust. This was a pretty simple profile to crack its layers are pretty simple and it doesn't try to be something other than its profile portrays. 
If you like the original I feel this should fulfill your requirements without paying a premium, I've kept the flavours simple and they should already be in your arsenal or otherwise easily obtained.

Best between 7-10 days the flavours really then come alive sweet berries and creamy banana with a graham cracker exhale.

Enjoy xx

reviews.text: Another excellent mix from dazcole, I've never had the original so I can't compare it but this is brilliant.
Very close to the original. This is going into the main rotation. Thanks dazcole!

This is a delicious clone. For me, It needs a little more airy dairy in the middle to fluff it up and mellow out the banana a little more to be spot on. I haven't had the real thing in a few months though. I'll still vape the crap out of this. Great job.
Delicious as always from Mr.Cole. Description describes it perfectly. Really does pop after a week. My second favorite recipe from you under circus cookie. I always have a big batch of that steeping.
